scripts.herokuInit: node sequelize-init.js && npx sequelize-mig migration:undo --statp ./src/db/states && npx sequelize-mig migration:make --statp ./src/db/states && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.localInit: node sequelize-init.js && npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-mig migration:undo --statp ./src/db/states && npx sequelize-mig migration:make --statp ./src/db/states && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.nuke: node sequelize-init.js && npx sequelize-mig migration:undo --statp ./src/db/states && npx sequelize-mig migration:make --statp ./src/db/states && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
